section.title: Purpose
section.p: EQFGETSEGNUM retrieves the segment number of the currently selected proposal (the segment that was used before by the EQFGETPROP call).

plentry.pd: The pointer to the ULONG variable receiving the segment number.

section.title: Return codes
section.p: One of the values listed in .

section.title: Remarks
section.p: You can use the retrieved segment number, for example, as input parameter with the EQFDELSEG call.
